channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 06:42 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 06:42 Threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community repulsed. Stay tuned for further reports. #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
